desc: Minerals Direct are stockists of Equi Minerals Plus, a highly bioavailable supplement formulation containing recommended levels of vitamins and minerals.

layout.text: Equi Minerals Plus equine supplement gives your horse the chance to shine

A highly bioavailable horse supplement formulation containing recommended levels of vitamins and minerals including organic forms of iron, zinc, manganese, copper and selenium in addition to probiotics, a prebiotic, yeast and digestive enzymes.
